channel.title: Edge Collective
channel.description: Edge Collective is a distributed research, teaching, and facilitation cooperative working to help individuals and communities increase the capacity of their vital food, water, energy, and communications infrastructure to adapt to challenging environments.
channel.itunes:author: Edge Collective

item.title: S01 E03 Farming in A Pandemic
item.description: Interview with Tom Prohl of Wolfesneck Farm in Freeport, Maine (USA).

item.title: S01 E01 A History of Indymedia
item.description: We talk with Hamish Campbell about the history of Indymedia.

item.title: S01 E02 Stewarding Technological Freedom in Agriculture
item.description: Discussion with Mike Stenta, Jamie Gaehring, and Don Blair. (Originally recorded for LibrePlanet2020.
